description: I'm a Platform Engineer working at Amedio Web Services. A Platform Engineer is a professional responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the underlying infrastructure that supports software applications and services. They play a crucial role in ensuring that software runs efficiently, reliably, and at scale.
detailOrQuote: Platform Engineer is a critical member of a software development and operations team, responsible for ensuring that the underlying infrastructure is robust, efficient, and scalable. Their work enables applications to run smoothly and reliably, even under high demand.
